title: IIT Kharagpur Kolkata Campus
text: In addition to the Kharagpur Campus, the college has three extension centers at Kolkata, Bhubaneshwar and Raipur. The extension provides venue for programs under Continuing Education Programme , IIT Kharagpur and also provides Guest House accomodation. [ 1 ]

title: Links
text: Website : http://www.cep.iitkgp.ac.in/?pid=98CFCEXT Accomodation form and Information : http://iitkgp.ac.in/downloads/kolkata_form.pdf
